properties.title: Resources - Special Interest Groups - Jakarta Struts

section.name: Special Interest Groups
section.p: Atlanta Struts Users Group - The Atlanta Struts Users Group (ASUG) is a free, informal, all-volunteer, technically-savvy group of Atlanta Struts enthusiasts, professionals and zealots who keep each other informed about issues and innovations in the Struts Framework. Come to the meetings and contribute!
